languages.text: {n}Юноша вспыхивает, когда замечает ваш взгляд.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, как хорошо, что вы здесь! Только вам под силу разрешить эту дилемму: кто из нас подлинный священнослужитель благородных кровей, а кто — нахальный самозванец".

{n}The young man flushes when he notices your gaze.{/n} "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, how fortunate is your arrival! Only you can solve this conundrum and decide which of us is the true clergyman of noble birth and which is the arrogant impostor."
languages.original_text: {n}Юноша вспыхивает, когда замечает ваш взгляд.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, как хорошо, что вы здесь! Только вам под силу разрешить эту дилемму: кто из нас подлинный священнослужитель благородных кровей, а кто — нахальный самозванец".

traits.locale_text: {n}The young man flushes when he notices your gaze.{/n} "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, how fortunate is your arrival! Only you can solve this conundrum and decide which of us is the true ecclesiarch of noble birth and which is the arrogant impostor."

{n}The younger priest flushes when he notices your gaze.{/n} "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, how fortunate is your arrival! Only you can solve this conundrum and decide which of us is the true ecclesiarch from the upper quarters and which is the arrogant impostor."

{n}The young man flushes when he notices your gaze.{/n} "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, how fortunate is your arrival! Only you can solve this conundrum and decide which of us is the true ecclesiarch of noble birth and which is the arrogant impostor."

{n}The younger priest flushes when he notices your gaze.{/n} "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, how fortunate is your arrival! Only you can solve this conundrum and decide which of us is the true ecclesiarch from the upper quarters and which is the arrogant impostor."

{n}The young man flushes when he notices your gaze.{/n} "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, how fortunate is your arrival! Only you can solve this conundrum and decide which of us is the true clergyman of noble birth and which is the arrogant impostor."

{n}The young man flushes when he notices your gaze.{/n} "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, how fortunate is your arrival! Only you can solve this conundrum and decide which of us is the true clergyman of noble birth and which is the arrogant impostor."

{n}The young man flushes when he notices your gaze.{/n} "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, how fortunate is your arrival! Only you can solve this conundrum and decide which of us is the true ecclesiarch of noble birth and which is the arrogant impostor."

languages.text: {n}年轻人脸涨得通红，随后注意到了你的目光。{/n}“噢，来自上界的大人，您的到来真是个好消息！只有您能解决这个难题，判断出我们之中谁是贵族出身的牧师，谁是装腔作势的冒牌货。”
languages.original_text: {n}The young man flushes when he notices your gaze.{/n} "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, how fortunate is your arrival! Only you can solve this conundrum and decide which of us is the true clergyman of noble birth and which is the arrogant impostor."

traits.locale_text: {n}年轻人脸涨得通红，随后注意到了你的目光。{/n}“噢，来自上界的大人，您的到来真是个好消息！只有您能解决这个难题，判断出我们之中谁是贵族出身的牧师，谁是装腔作势的冒牌货。”

languages.text: {n}若い男は、あなたの視線に気づくと顔を赤らめた。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}、あなた様のご到着はなんと幸運なことでしょう！この難題を解き、私たちのどちらが貴族で、どちらが傲慢な偽者かを決められるのは、あなた様だけなのです」
languages.original_text: {n}The young man flushes when he notices your gaze.{/n} "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, how fortunate is your arrival! Only you can solve this conundrum and decide which of us is the true clergyman of noble birth and which is the arrogant impostor."

traits.locale_text: {n}若い司祭は、あなたの視線に気づくと顔を赤らめた。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}、あなた様のご到着はなんと幸運なことでしょう！この難題を解き、私たちのどちらが上層区の真なる司祭で、どちらが傲慢な偽者かを決められるのは、あなた様だけなのです」

languages.text: {n}El joven se ruboriza al percatarse de que le miras.{/n} «¡Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, su llegada no podía ser más propicia! Solo usted puede resolver este dilema y decidir cuál de los dos es el auténtico clérigo de noble cuna y cuál es un impostor arrogante».
languages.original_text: {n}The young man flushes when he notices your gaze.{/n} "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, how fortunate is your arrival! Only you can solve this conundrum and decide which of us is the true clergyman of noble birth and which is the arrogant impostor."

traits.locale_text: {n}El joven se ruboriza al percatarse de que le miras.{/n} «¡Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, su llegada no podía ser más propicia! Solo usted puede resolver este dilema y decidir cuál de los dos es el auténtico clérigo de noble cuna y cuál es un impostor arrogante».

languages.text: {n}Ona baktığını fark eden genç adam kızarıyor.{/n} "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, gelişiniz ne büyük bir talih! Ancak siz bu ikiliği çözebilir ve hangimizin soylu ve gerçek din adamı, hangimizin taklitçi olduğuna karar verebilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}The young man flushes when he notices your gaze.{/n} "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, how fortunate is your arrival! Only you can solve this conundrum and decide which of us is the true clergyman of noble birth and which is the arrogant impostor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ona baktığını fark eden genç adam kızarıyor.{/n} "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, gelişiniz ne büyük bir talih! Ancak siz bu ikiliği çözebilir ve hangimizin soylu ve gerçek din adamı, hangimizin taklitçi olduğuna karar verebilirsiniz."

languages.text: {n}Le jeune homme rougit en remarquant votre regard posé sur lui.{/n} « Votre Céleste Seigneurie, vous arrivez à point nommé ! Il n'y a que vous qui puissiez trancher ce dilemme afin de déterminer lequel de nous est le véritable ecclésiastique de noble naissance et lequel est un imposteur arrogant. »
languages.original_text: {n}The young man flushes when he notices your gaze.{/n} "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, how fortunate is your arrival! Only you can solve this conundrum and decide which of us is the true clergyman of noble birth and which is the arrogant impostor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le jeune homme rougit en remarquant votre regard posé sur lui.{/n} « Votre Céleste Seigneurie, vous arrivez à point nommé ! Il n'y a que vous qui puissiez trancher ce dilemme afin de déterminer lequel de nous est le véritable ecclésiastique de noble naissance et lequel est un imposteur arrogant. »

languages.text: {n}Der junge Mann errötet, als er deinen Blick bemerkt.{/n} "{mf|Himmlischer Herr|Himmlische Herrin}, Eure Ankunft ist wahrlich ein Glück! Nur Ihr könnt dieses Problem lösen und entscheiden, wer von uns der wahre Priester von adeliger Geburt ist und wer der arrogante Hochstapler."
languages.original_text: {n}The young man flushes when he notices your gaze.{/n} "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, how fortunate is your arrival! Only you can solve this conundrum and decide which of us is the true clergyman of noble birth and which is the arrogant impostor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der junge Mann errötet, als er deinen Blick bemerkt.{/n} "{mf|Himmlischer Herr|Himmlische Herrin}, Eure Ankunft ist wahrlich ein Glück! Nur Ihr könnt dieses Problem lösen und entscheiden, wer von uns der wahre Priester von adeliger Geburt ist und wer der arrogante Hochstapler."
